TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
1 hour ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. Welcome Infinikea. It's at teh opposite side of Laniakea.

I wish Great Attractor was more attractive.

Granted, now we are all in a single spot 

 

I wish nobody made planet packs

Granted. Planet Packs are no longer manufactured. But, look out, by the makers of Planet Packs comes the latest craze, Planet Pox!!!!.....

I wish that the former makers of Planet Packs has a change of leadership for bringing this dreadful product into being?

22 minutes ago, Exploro said:

Granted. Planet Packs are no longer manufactured. But, look out, by the makers of Planet Packs comes the latest craze, Planet Pox!!!!.....

I wish that the former makers of Planet Packs has a change of leadership for bringing this dreadful product into being?

(ohno my strategy didnt work!)
Granted, and now every single cubic nanometer of space in ksp is filled with at least 20 trillion planets

I wish for it to be less dense

Granted. It is less dense, but we will never know what "it" is.

I wish for an inert bottle of root beer.

Edited January 20, 2023 by thepres1s_Stuff
oopsie

Granted. Please go find Doctor Strange to get it. 

I wish for SCP-294

Granted. You order a liquid vacuum, and now are trying to unstick.

I wish SCP was real.

27 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. You order a liquid vacuum, and now are trying to unstick.

I wish SCP was real.

Granted, but you drawn in SCP-999s (thats the cute n cuddly blob boi, right?)

I wish for the person on the opposite side of the planet for me to have the sky turn eyebleedingly pink before their eyes

Granted. But the foundation uses SRAs to stabilize the reality so no.

I wish for plutonium

Granted.  And, as before, it's still illegal to own, so you are arrested and incarcerated for the remainder of your natural life.

I wish people would stop wishing for things they've already wished for and had corrupted.

Granted. We all start wishing for the same thing you just did!

I wish people would stop wishing for things they've already wished for and had corrupted.
 

ok ok joke aside heres my actual wish for your corrupting pleasure:

I wish i had a replicator from star trek the next gen/voyager/ds9

193301202023

20 minutes ago, AlamoVampire said:

Granted. We all start wishing for the same thing you just did!

I wish people would stop wishing for things they've already wished for and had corrupted.
 

ok ok joke aside heres my actual wish for your corrupting pleasure:

I wish i had a replicator from star trek the next gen/voyager/ds9

193301202023

Granted, but it can ONLY replicate itself, which causes some... funky things to happen as more ships are replicated inside of each other until reality collapses in on itself

 

 

I wish for... hmm.. reverse psychology!

Time reverses itself (from our points of view anyway), causing progress in psychology to also reverse, and everything eventually becomes undone.

I wish to go to the FIRST Worlds competition.

24 minutes ago, LHACK4142 said:

Time reverses itself (from our points of view anyway), causing progress in psychology to also reverse, and everything eventually becomes undone.

I wish to go to the FIRST Worlds competition.

Granted, it is on Mercury, as it is the first world from the sun

I wish the earth had 25636765 moons

Granted. But the 25636766-body problem makes everyone mad. 

I wish for nuclear fireworks.

Granted, but before you could light them, you get arrested for having nuclear fireworks.

I wish for an inert bomb.

Granted.  Inert or not, still illegal.  Jail time for you!

I wish to survive a nuclear holocaust through radioactive mutation.

Granted. You are now a sentient glowing puddle of goo.

i wish this wish triggers a new page!

181601212023

and it didnt… so corruption?

Granted. You are now a sentient glowing puddle of goo.

i wish this wish triggers a new page!

181601212023

181701212023

Granted, it is the 18th post of the page, but you have to find the exact value above 5 where your post is on another page.

 

I wish the sky becomes funny

Granted, the sky now features a multitude of clown faces for all eternity. However, the wish-granter was unaware of your crippling fear of clowns. Thus, while the sky has now become funny, you never leave your house for the rest of your days.

I wish for better tasting tea.

7 minutes ago, Exploro said:

Granted, the sky now features a multitude of clown faces for all eternity. However, the wish-granter was unaware of your crippling fear of clowns. Thus, while the sky has now become funny, you never leave your house for the rest of your days.

I wish for better tasting tea.

Granted, the tea can taste now... somehow!


I wish for coffee to taste better

2 hours ago, JcoolTheShipbuilder said:

Granted, the tea can taste now... somehow!


I wish for coffee to taste better

Granted: You have the ability to drink hot chocolate.

I wish for Thanksgiving to have more fun than just eating.

Granted. You are eating cereals and giving thanks to everybody. It's your personal Thanksgiving.

I wish for a personal castle.

Granted. The castle is decrepit and is somewhat broken.

I wish for pluto to become a planet

Edited January 22, 2023 by ffx

Granted. Pluto is a planet but Earth is demoted to cheese doodle.

i wish for a hug.
